name: Space Tour!
description:
Simple addictive game!

Use the centrifugal force of the planet and keep move yourself!
Watch out, you may go off the course so don't get too careless.

Try challenging high scores on the leaderboards!
Collect the stars! You can collect variety of spaceships!
Share your score to your friends!

Note: If you delete the game, stored content on your device will be deleted.
